traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The aartuk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The aartuk makes two Branch attacks, two Radiant Pellet attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Branch
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Pellet
entries: Ranged Spell atk +2 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 7 (3d4 damage) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The aartuk casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
